specials.name: Ranged
specials.description: bone shard +22 (range increment 30 feet), Damage 2d6+10 piercing

specials.name: Tail Sweep
specials.description: The bone devil sweeps its tail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must succeed at a DC 28 Reflex save or be knocked prone.

specials.name: Bone Devil Venom
specials.description: (poison) Saving Throw DC 27 Fortitude; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; Stage 1 2d6 poison damage, enfeebled 1 (1 round); Stage 2 3d6 poison damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round); Stage 3 3d6 poison damage, enfeebled 2, and the creature takes a –4 status penalty to Will saves against attempts to Coerce it (1 hour)

specials.name: Quick Invisibility
specials.description: The bone devil can cast invisibility on itself using only 1 action.

specials.name: Sadistic Strike
specials.description: A bone devil deals an extra 2d6 damage whenever it hits an creature that has the enfeebled, frightened, or prone condition with any of its Strikes.
